name: KAJU KATLI
about: A traditional Indian dessert characterized by its diamond shape, made with cashew nuts, sugar, cardamom powder, and ghee butter.

name: CHANDRAKALA
about: Chandrakala is very famous Indian sweet found in local sweet stalls prepared with maida and khoya as main ingredients.

name: MOTICHOOR LADDU
about: Motichur laddu are soft, delish melt in the mouth ladoo made mainly with gram flour, sugar, and spices.

name: MILK CAKE
about: An indian sweet dessert recipe prepared from solidified, sweetened milk which is prepared during festival and religious events.

name: SOAN PAPDI
about: Soan papdi is made by combining sugar, gram-flour and ghee.
